name: Personal Project Launcher
description: Quick launch Java projects with Git, Sonar, and IDEs

preferences.name: Project Launcher keyword
preferences.description: Keyword to trigger project search (e.g., p)

preferences.name: Base Projects Directory
preferences.description: The main directory where all your Java projects are stored

preferences.name: IntelliJ Executable Path
preferences.description: Full path to the IntelliJ IDEA executable (bin/idea)

preferences.name: Git Tool Script Path
preferences.description: The absolute path to your git-tool.sh script

preferences.name: Terminal Emulator
preferences.description: The command to open your terminal (e.g., gnome-terminal, xfce4-terminal, or konsole)

preferences.name: Sonar Latest URL
preferences.description: Server URL for the latest SonarQube version

preferences.name: Sonar Latest Token
preferences.description: Access token for the latest SonarQube
